name: OS Timeline Blog
author: Offshorent Solutions Pvt Ltd. | Jinesh.P.V

sections.description:
OS Timeline blog is a way of displaying a list of blogs in a chronological, colorful and attractive order. It is typically a graphic design showing a long bar labeled with date, author avatar and comments count.

Features

  • Admin interface to manage blog appearance
  • Easy to Change the blog title, font family, content and title color etc.
  • Variety of blog appearance options

Support

So that others can share in the answer, please submit your support requests through the WordPress forums for Timeline Blog(https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/timeline-blog).
sections.installation:
Minimum requirements:

WordPress 4.3+
PHP 5.4.x
MySQL 5.4.x+

Installation from within backend:

  1. In plugin manager, click “Add New”
  2. Search for “timeline-blog”
  3. Click “install”
  4. Activate the plugin once it is installed
  5. Click on “OS Timeline Blog” from the left menu and follow the instructions to complete the installation

FTP upload installation method:

  1. Upload the timeline-blog folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory using your FTP client
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu
  3. Go to the Timeline menu, finish the installation and manage blog appearance

Zip upload installation method (make sure uploads up to 5MB are allowed for your hosting):

  1. Login to your WordPress site administrator panel and head over the ‘Plugins’ menu
  2. Click ‘Add New’
  3. Choose the ‘Upload’ option
  4. Click Choose file (Browse) and select the timeline-blog.*.zip file.
  5. Click Install Now button.
  6. Once it is complete, activate the plugin.
  7. Go to the Timeline menu, finish the installation and manage blog appearance

An answer to that question.
